alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 3:21AM CDT until August 09 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Stafford County in south central Kansas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 321 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Great Bend to near Radium to Garfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Radium around 330 AM CDT. Seward and Zook around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include St. John, Macksville, Hudson, Dillwyn and Stafford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
